thread.title: This Republic Day, Shop And Enjoy These Amazing Online Sales!
thread.title_full: This Republic Day, Shop And Enjoy These Amazing Online Sales!

title: This Republic Day, Shop And Enjoy These Amazing Online Sales!
text:
facebook 
Today we are celebrating the country's 68th Republic Day and we're filled with pride! While you enjoy patriotic songs and movies, we also want you to give your attention to these amazing online offers. There are several online stores giving you some fantastic offers. Be it clothing or gadgets, there is something for everybody. Enjoy! Nykaa 
If you are in love with make-up and finding ways to buy new products, we think today is your day. The online make-up store is offering up to 40% off on several big make-up brands. Time to splurge, girl. Jabong 
Republic Day is a blessing in disguise for people who love shopping. The online clothing store has a special offer of 68 % flat for various products. Are you on the site already? 
Paytm 
After demonetisation we all know about this money sharing-shopping app, don't we? Today they have crazy offers in their Maha Bazaar. They are offering about minimum of 68% percent of various watches and clothing brands. Flipkart 
Keeping up with the competition, Indian brand Flipkart also has a sale on various lifestyle products. If you are planning to buy electronics, this is definitely the right time. Shop till you drop honey! Photo Credit: BCCL
